name: Cute Pet Cafe
description:
Cute Pet Cafe is a game where you have to fulfill orders for pets in a café. Each customer has a list of orders, such as apples, beefs, and coffees, that you must deliver as quickly as possible. The faster you fulfill the orders, the higher your rating at the end, but be careful not to burn anything. With Cute Pet Cafe, you'll have hours of fun in a skill-based game that requires speed and precision, perfect for animal and cooking game enthusiasts!

Credits: Illustrations: • Isadora Viegas Guedes Sounds: • https://pixabay.com/
